message_1: Find the discrete logarithm of 7 to the base 3 modulo 19.
message_2:
To find the discrete logarithm of 7 to the base 3 modulo 19, we are looking for an integer x such that:

3^x ≡ 7 (mod 19)

We can use the brute force method to find the value of x by calculating the powers of 3 modulo 19 until we find the one that is congruent to 7.

3^1 ≡ 3 (mod 19)
3^2 ≡ 9 (mod 19)
3^3 ≡ 8 (mod 19)
3^4 ≡ 5 (mod 19)
3^5 ≡ 15 (mod 19)
3^6 ≡ 7 (mod 19)

So, the discrete logarithm of 7 to the base 3 modulo 19 is x = 6.
